snippet: New York is emerging as a leader in commercial rooftop agriculture, which means less pollution and fewer miles for trucks carrying produce.
abstract: New York City is emerging as a leader in commercial rooftop agriculture, with expectations for continued growth in the near future; new farm operations in New York are selling greens and other vegetables by the boxful to local residents and by the bushel to supermarket chains.
lead_paragraph: New York is emerging as a leader in commercial rooftop agriculture, which means less pollution and fewer miles for trucks carrying produce.

headline.seo: In Rooftop Farming, New York City Emerges as a Leader
headline.main: To Find Fields to Farm in New York City, Just Look Up
headline.print_headline: To Find Fields to Farm in New York City, Just Look Up
